long_description: The flexible Salomon Soft Flask compresses as you drink it to eliminate water bouncing inside and reduce sucking effort. Blaster valve helps ensure the flask remains leak-free until you bite it. 16 fl. oz. thermoplastic polyurethane flask is free of BPA, PVC and phthalates.
short_description: The flexible Salomon Soft Flask compresses as you drink it to eliminate water bouncing inside and reduce sucking effort. Blaster valve helps ensure the flask remains leak-free until you bite it.
